#id=1
#text=Today I went to go get a haircut .
#id=2
#text=I 've been waiting to get a haircut for a while but finally I decided it was time to get it .
#id=3
#text=So I went over to the barbershop near my house .
#id=4
#text=Once inside the barbershop I told the barber that I needed a haircut and took my seat util they called my name .
#id=5
#text=Once they called my name I went and sat at the chair and the barber put a towel over me so that the hair that he cuts does n't get over my clothes .
#id=6
#text=I tell him what kind of haircut I want and then he begins to cut my hair .
#id=7
#text=He periodically asks me if he is doing a good job throughout the haircut to make sure that I am happy with the hair that he is cutting .
#id=8
#text=I reassure him that he is doing a good job and after he is done he takes off the towel and I get a final look at my haircut .
#id=9
#text=I nod my head , pay him for the haircut and also a tip and leave the barbershop after that .
#text=I have to take a shower afterwards for some hair that happened to get down the back of my shirt .
